name: 1NPUT
description:
Install instructions

Game A Week week 5 game made in a week! (DUALSHOCK 4 CONTROLLER REQUIRED) -

Description-

Welcome to the 1NPUT Lab movement test 5723! You have been chosen to participate in an experiment! What kind? Nothing malicious i promise!  We needed a candidate that plays or has a passion for video games to take part in the test. The consists of nothing more than a Dualshock Playstation 4 Controller...sounds simple right? Well theres a catch....You must play the game in different ways to the standard. We want to see if the human mind can manage a shift in controller orientation. The test begins now!

Control Schemes And Controls-

How To Hold the controller is shown in the game!

The Standard-

Left - Dpad Left

Right - Dpad Right

Jump - Cross

The Scale-

Left - R1

Right - L1

Jump - Touchpad Press

The Boomerang -

Left - Dpad Down

Right - Dpad Up

Jump - Circle

The Bident-

Left - Circle

Right - Square

Jump - Dpad Up
